bullets: Delivered clutch TD pass to Colbie Young in Q3 vs Alabama
Georgia's passing attack more aggressive with Stockton under center
Alabama's secondary has allowed 2+ passing TDs in 4 of last 6 games
Stockton shows excellent pocket presence and accuracy on intermediate routes
insights.analysis: Our fair value model suggests Stockton is underpriced at 1.5 TDs. The clip analysis shows his ability to deliver precise strikes under pressure, particularly the touchdown pass to Young that showcased his arm talent and decision-making. Against Alabama's defense, his mobility and quick release create additional scoring opportunities.

bullets: Averaging 298 yards per game since taking over as starter
Alabama allows 312 passing yards per game to opposing QBs
Georgia's receiving corps healthy and creating separation
Game script likely favors passing in potential shootout scenario
insights.analysis: Video evidence shows Stockton's ability to push the ball downfield effectively. His completion to Young demonstrates his range and accuracy on intermediate routes. With Alabama's aggressive pass rush, quick game and RPOs should generate consistent yardage accumulation.

bullets: Dropped wide open pass in critical Q2 drive vs Georgia
Georgia's secondary has been vulnerable but Williams showing inconsistent hands
Alabama may target other receivers more frequently after drop issues
Wind conditions could affect passing game timing
insights.analysis: The drop against Georgia raises concerns about Williams' reliability in high-pressure moments. Our model adjusts his fair value downward based on this evidence of inconsistent hands. The market hasn't fully accounted for this risk factor, creating value on the under.

bullets: Perfect TD strike to Isaiah Horton in Q4 crunch time vs Georgia
Red zone efficiency has improved dramatically with Simpson
Georgia's defense vulnerable to quick slants and pick plays
Alabama's offensive line providing excellent protection
insights.analysis: Simpson's touchdown pass to Horton showcased his poise and accuracy in high-leverage situations. The throw demonstrates his ability to deliver strikes in tight windows. Against Georgia's defense, his mobility and arm talent create multiple scoring opportunities, especially in the red zone.

bullets: Crucial 3rd & 10 TD pass sparked comeback vs Wake Forest
Dual-threat ability creates additional red zone opportunities
Wake Forest's defense allows 2.1 passing TDs per game
King's mobility extends plays and creates throwing lanes
insights.analysis: King's clutch touchdown pass on 3rd & 10 demonstrates his ability to deliver under pressure. The play shows excellent pocket presence and arm strength. His dual-threat capability forces defenses to account for both run and pass, creating favorable matchups for receivers.

bullets: Scored crucial rushing TD bringing game within 3 points
Averaging 58 rushing yards per game over last 4 contests
Wake Forest allows 4.8 yards per carry to opposing QBs
Georgia Tech's RPO offense maximizes King's mobility
insights.analysis: King's rushing touchdown showcases his explosiveness in short-yardage situations. His ability to scramble and create yards after the pocket breaks down adds significant value. The market is undervaluing his rushing production based on recent performance trends.

bullets: Two touchdown passes vs USC including 64-yard bomb to Feagin
Illinois receivers creating excellent separation vs USC secondary
Altmyer showing improved deep ball accuracy and timing
USC's defense vulnerable to big plays through the air
insights.analysis: Altmyer's two touchdown performance against USC demonstrates his upside in favorable matchups. The 64-yard strike to Feagin shows his ability to connect on deep balls when given time. Illinois' offensive system creates high-percentage looks that should lead to multiple scoring opportunities.

bullets: 64-yard touchdown bomb shows deep ball accuracy and arm strength
Illinois offensive line providing excellent pass protection
USC secondary has struggled with vertical passing concepts
Weather conditions favorable for passing attack
insights.analysis: The deep touchdown pass to Feagin highlights Altmyer's ability to generate explosive plays. Video shows excellent footwork and ball placement on vertical routes. Against USC's vulnerable secondary, multiple opportunities exist for chunk yardage plays.

bullets: Threw costly interception to Dylan Rosiek in Q3 vs Illinois
Illinois defense has forced 1.4 interceptions per game
Maiava showing tendency for risky throws under pressure
USC's offensive line struggles creating consistent protection
insights.analysis: Maiava's interception against Illinois demonstrates concerning decision-making under pressure. The throw shows poor ball placement and failure to read defensive coverage. With Illinois' aggressive defense, multiple turnover opportunities are likely to present themselves.

bullets: Explosive 75-yard touchdown run showcases elite breakaway speed
Illinois defense allows 5.2 yards per carry to opposing RBs
Lemon's vision and cutting ability create big play potential
USC's offensive line providing improved run blocking
insights.analysis: Lemon's 75-yard touchdown demonstrates elite breakaway ability and vision. The run shows excellent patience behind blocks and explosive acceleration through the hole. Against Illinois' defense, his big-play capability creates significant upside potential.

bullets: Scored crucial touchdown catch vs LSU showing excellent hands
LSU secondary has struggled covering slot receivers
Anderson's route running creates consistent separation
Ole Miss passing offense targets slot position frequently
insights.analysis: Anderson's touchdown catch demonstrates reliable hands and precise route running. The play shows his ability to create separation in tight coverage and make contested catches. LSU's defensive struggles in coverage create multiple target opportunities.

bullets: Touchdown reception showcases ability to win in red zone
Averaging 12.8 yards per reception over last 6 games

insights.analysis: Anderson's touchdown catch highlights his ability to create yards after contact. His route running precision and hands create consistent production opportunities. The market is undervaluing his role in Ole Miss' high-powered passing attack.
